quote_last:
, my lord,” the bodyguard reported.
“Ah, good. Still time.” He walked over to a group of pillows in the far corner of the room, and I realized that they had been strewn around a little raised platform of stone.
title: Blood Rites
author: Jim Butcher

quote_first: After painstaking ticket-office conversations and timetable consultations, I established with as much certainty as any tourist can hope for that the
quote_last: to Paris Est was a service on which accompanied bicycles could be carried free of charge.
title: French Revolutions
author: Tim Moore
